TopicTitle: Would anyone like to make a video of the Stella Expansion?

Articles.Content:
The Stella Expansion is a Kopernicus/KerbalKonstructs mod I made that adds a new star system to the game with unique planets. I was hoping someone could perhaps make a video of it?

Here's a link to the post of it on my Kopernicus Core thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102363-Kopernicus-Core-Common-API-Modpack-for-Planet-Creators?p=1587185#post1587185

Mission reports (with screenshots) on the forums are fine too!

Edited January 3, 2015 by _Augustus_

I'll get on it right away!

Question: Do you want something story based? Or just a showcase of what your mod can do?

Expect something by Tuesday.

I'll get on it right away!

Question: Do you want something story based? Or just a showcase of what your mod can do?

Expect something by Tuesday.

Either is great. Remember to install the Kopernicus Core and Kerbal Konstructs, though.

Now that I think of it, I am making something about visiting the jool system (Project Integrity), and I have a planned sequel, incredibly likely to the Stella system. It will most likely be an AAR, but there is a chance I would make it a cinematic. Small chance.

Edited January 6, 2015 by Rolanvorxariat

Now that I think of it, I am making something about visiting the jool system, and I have a planned sequel, incredibly likely to the Stella system. It will most likely be an AAR, but there is a chance I would make it a cinematic. Small chance.

Please do it soon
